Name: Use the Teleporter to get to the lower area of Ebon Hold.

Name: Take the gryphon back to the ground.

Name: You received a QuestItem-Box. Open it and dual wield the weapons inside.
Text: You received a QuestItem-Box. Open it and dual wield the weapons inside.

Name: Kill NPCs now without any spells(auto attack) until they tell you what the Crimson Dawn is. This usually takes 5-6 NPCs. EQUIP YOUR WEAPON AFTERWARDS AGAIN!!!
